name: Diverge
introduce: Diverge is a Next-Gen Metaverse fashion company, exploring the way of expressing a digital identity, through high-end digital collectibles, that have utilities across Web3 eco-system and beyond. Diverge's mission is to inspire Web3 communities to start a digital fashion journey and dive into experimenting with digital identity. Diverge strives to bring the aesthetic of high fashion into the virtual space while contributing to the mass adoption of digital fashion.
